nodes.text: Currsk was a male Trandoshan who worked as a bounty hunter, along with his brother, Keerag. After the Human Deggar Feps angered the Hutt Sonnos, Feps attempted to travel from the planet Nal Hutta to the moon Nar Shaddaa, by gaining passage aboard the starship Lost Lady. Currsk and Keerag also took up places on the ship, planning to find and kill Feps.
